page.title: 06INTERVIEW WITH HEADMASTER.
page.content: {16,WHEN WAS THE RED GRA MADE ? IN 1974. {17,WHEN WERE THE FRENCH BLOCKS BUILT ? IN 1979. {18,DOES EACH ROOM HAVE A BLACKBOARD ? NO BUT THE MAJORITY DO. {19,FOR HOW LONG HAS THE STAGE {BEEN BUILT ? IT WAS BUILT IN 1964 BECAUSE IT WAS AN ORIGINAL PART OF THE BUILDING. {20,WERE YOU A TEACHER AT THIS SCHOOL {BEFORE YOU CAME HEADMASTER ? NO. I WAS A TEACHER AT NORTHAMPTONSHIRE. {21,WHAT WAS YOUR MOST EMBARRISING {MOMENT AT THIS SCHOOL ? { }IT WAS 26TH MAY 1981.IT WAS THE PRODUCTION OF THE SOUND OF MUSIC AND THE MAYOR OF EREWASH CAME.IT WAS NOT A GOOD PERFORMANCE,THE LEAD GIRL WAS NERVOUS AND SHE FROZE,SHE HAD STAGE FRIGHT.
